string-array.name: head
string-array.item: Is your neck painful since a special move?
Is your neck colored?
Did you fall on your head?
Have you ever broken your neck?
Do you feel pain when your try to move your neck?
Do you feel pain even without moving your neck?

string-array.name: shoulder
string-array.item: Is your shoulder bigger than usual?
Is your shoulder colored?
Did you fall on your shoulder?
Have you ever dislocated your shoulder?
Have you ever broken your shoulder?
Do you feel pain when your try to move your shoulder?
Do you feel pain even without moving your shoulder?
